book.title: Gentoo Handbook
book.abstract: This is the Gentoo Handbook, an effort to centralise Gentoo/Linux information.

chapter.title: Installing Gentoo
chapter.abstract: In this chapter you learn how to install Gentoo on your system.

section.title: About the Gentoo Linux Installation
section.abstract: Users not known to Gentoo don't always know that choice is what Gentoo is all about.

section.title: Choosing the Right Installation Medium
section.abstract: You can install Gentoo in many ways. You can use our LiveCD, an existing distribution etc.

section.title: Configuring your Network
section.abstract: If you want to install Gentoo using the Internet, you need to setup networking.

section.title: Preparing the Disks
section.abstract: To be able to install Gentoo, you must create the necessary partitions. This section describes how to partition a disk for future usage.

section.title: Installing the Gentoo Installation Files
section.abstract: Gentoo installs work through socalled stage-files. In this section we describe how you extract a stage-file and chroot into your system.

section.title: Installing the Gentoo Base System
section.abstract: Independent of what stage you chose, the eventual result is that you have a Gentoo base system at your disposal. This section describes how to progress to that stadium.

section.title: Configuring the Kernel
section.abstract: The Linux kernel is the core of every distribution. This section explains how to configure your kernel.

section.title: Configuring the Bootloader
section.abstract: Several bootloaders exist. Each one of them has its own way of configuration. In this section we'll describe all possibilities for you and step you through the process of configuring a bootloader to your needs.

section.title: Configuring your System
section.abstract: You need to edit some important configuration files. In this section you receive an overview of these files and an explanation on how to proceed.

section.title: Installing Necessary System Tools
section.abstract: As mentioned before, Gentoo is about choices. In this section we help you install tools of which you have the choice of choosing from.

section.title: Finalising your Gentoo Installation
section.abstract: You're almost done. We'll just create one (or more) users for your system and leave the installation to reboot into a brand new Gentoo installation.

section.title: Where to go from here?
section.abstract: Now you have your Gentoo system, but what's next?
